product.title: Quasimodo to the Rescue | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Quasimodo to the Rescue!

In this enjoyable follow-up to the Disney favorite, the quirky but lovable Quasimodo continues his bell-ringing duties in Paris, accompanied by his loyal stone gargoyle companions. When a severe storm hits, the gargoyles are knocked into a farmer’s cart and carried off to parts unknown. The story follows Quasi’s industrious attempts to track down and bring home the gargoyles, illustrating the importance of helping friends in need and using innovation to overcome obstacles.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to think of a time when he helped out someone who was facing a difficulty. Encourage him to recall the results of his good deed, and how he felt afterward.
